text:
Bro this is the saddest thing you’ve done @justinsuntron 

You paid 5M for a lunch with Buffett but you applied for a relief grant paid for by taxpayers that’s meant to help struggling businesses during the pandemic, knowing damn well you didn’t need it

https://t.co/HaPfyVFCf4
